title: Topic 004 Question 054
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a virtual machine named VM1 and a network security group (NSG) named NSG1. NSG1 has the default rules configured. VM1 runs Windows Server 2022 and contains a single NIC named NIC1. NIC1 is associated with NSG1.
You need to prevent access to the Azure Instance Metadata Service (IMDS) REST API on VM1. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
What should you add to NSG1?
options: an outbound rule that blocks traffic to an IP address.
an inbound rule that blocks traffic to an IP address.
an inbound and outbound rule that blocks traffic to an application security group.
an outbound rule that blocks traffic to a service tag.
